original_text: Also they were over the bearers of burdens, and were overseers of all that wrought the work in any manner of service: and of the Levites there were scribes, and officers, and porters.
korean_text: 그들은 또 목도꾼을 감독하며 모든 공사 담당자를 감독하고 어떤 레위 사람은 서기와 관리와 문지기가 되었더라

sentences.original_text: Also they were over the bearers of burdens
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그들은 짐을 나르는 사람들을 감독하였으며

sentences.original_text: and were overseers of all that wrought the work
and of the Levites there were scribes,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 레위 사람 중에는 서기관들이 있었으며
